pdf_title: hackers plundered israeli defense firms that built ‘iron dome_u2019 missile defense system — krebs on security.pdf

APT.name: APT1
APT.description: APT1 is a Chinese threat group that has been attributed to the 2nd Bureau of the People’s Liberation Army (PLA) General Staff Department’s (GSD) 3rd Department, commonly known by its Military Unit Cover Designator (MUCD) as Unit 61398.
